entries.meaning: (uncountable) The state or characteristic of being shameless.
examples: [H]e added to all his other shamelessness this, that he offered the patriarch a large sum of money to buy a bishopric of him.

entries.meaning: (countable, rare) An utterance or action which is shameless.
examples: Shoals of letters are published every week from all parts of the Union telling stories of the unhappiness produced by marriage, sometimes mere bursts of ill-temper, often cynical shamelessnesses, occasionally stories of deep pathos.
